zh._subscribe_desc_: 随时获取本页的最新帖子、Lens 作品和旅行故事更新。

zh._about_page_desc_:
本网站建立于 GitHub Pages（github.io）平台，采用 HTML5、CSS3 和原生 JavaScript 开发。本站为单页面应用（SPA），所有代码由本站作者独立完成（部分代码通过 AI 工具优化）。如果有任何建议（建议使用框架除外 🌚），或发现任何关于本站的问题，可以在 GitHub 上提交 Issues。
万分感谢！爱你 😘

en._subscribe_desc_: Stay updated with the latest posts, lens works, and travel stories from this page.
en._menu_desc_home_: Welcome to the homepage of the site !
en._menu_desc_travel_: Explore the cherished memories from my travels
en._menu_desc_services_: Services you can get from me
en._menu_desc_about_: About this site, myself, or site settings
en._about_page_desc_:
This site is hosted on GitHub Pages (github.io) and developed using HTML5, CSS3, and native JavaScript. It is a Single Page Application (SPA), and all code has been independently developed by the site author (Some code is optimized by AI Tools). If you encounter any issues, or you have any suggestion, please submit them on GitHub Issues.
Thank you and LOVE you 😘
